articles.content: British scientists are starting a study Thursday to find out if it's OK to mix and match COVID-19 vaccines. The vaccines being rolled out now require two doses, and people are supposed to get two sho… [+2588 chars]

articles.title: Smokers should be prioritised for Covid vaccine shots: Study - BusinessLine
articles.description: Smokers are susceptible to other diseases as well, say researchers
articles.content:
A team of researchers has argued that smokers should also be included as one of the priority groups for Covid-19 jabs.

articles.title: Heres how pain experienced in everyday life impacts memory - Hindustan Times
articles.description: A new study has found that higher pain intensity is linked to reductions in working memory ability and increased activity in the ventromedial prefrontal cortex.
articles.content:
